triples.name: Cypher (query language)
triples.relevance: εStore uses a subset of Cypher to query its graph store, making it a core query interface for the system.

triples.name: Graph database
triples.relevance: εStore introduces a novel in-memory graph store that functions as a stripped-down graph database for testing and complex data structure implementation.

triples.name: Java (programming language)
triples.relevance: εStore is implemented in Java, making it the primary language platform for the system's development and deployment.

triples.name: Query language
triples.relevance: εStore adopts the query language concept through Cypher to enable expressive graph queries over in-memory objects.

triples.name: Software testing
triples.relevance: One of the primary applications of εStore is enabling complex assertions and testing for in-memory structures.

triples.name: Data structure
triples.relevance: εStore is designed to handle complex in-memory data structures by equating objects on the heap to graph nodes.
